title: Park Tool’s Free 3D Printing Pegboard Tool Holders
content:
Park Tool is synonymous with bike shops and at-home workshops alike. Today, the brand released seven 3D models offering unique profiles to hang its tools on common pegboard and Wall Control. If you don’t own a 3D printer, you can use services like Print a Thing to print for you. Find files for the following tools: 3-way wrenches, UP-SET utility pick set, CT-15 Professional Chain Tool, VC-1 valve core tool, DC-1 and DC-2 digital measuring calipers, DAG-2.2 and Dag-3 derailleur alignment gauges, and ATD-1.2 torque drivers at Park Tool.

The post Park Tool’s Free 3D Printing Pegboard Tool Holders appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
